original_text: Hold thy peace at the presence of the Lord God: for the day of the Lord is at hand: for the Lord hath prepared a sacrifice, he hath bid his guests.
korean_text: 주 여호와 앞에서 잠잠할지어다 이는 여호와의 날이 가까웠으므로 여호와께서 희생을 준비하고 그가 청할 자들을 구별하셨음이니라

sentences.original_text: at the presence of the Lord God
for the day of the Lord is at hand
for the Lord hath prepared a sacrifice
